ygData.subject: RE: magical 2h-slashing
ygData.msgSnippet: There aren t slashers...they be bashers (blunts). ... From: Thulgar [mailto:thulgar@efni.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:57 PM To: EQCheats@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
There aren't slashers...they be bashers (blunts).

-----Original Message-----
From: Thulgar [mailto:thulgar@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 2:57 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] magical 2h-slashing


well, for this you have , RTS, Ogre War Maul, Bloodforge Hammer, Observers
Staff*I believe is 2H*.
Anything else is just useless for higher lvl characters......
